sub_fields.label: Accordion Body
sub_fields.name: accordion_body
sub_fields.instructions: Add body content to the Accordion section.

fields.label: HTML Element
fields.name: html_element
fields.instructions:
Select the html element to use for this button.
Default is anchor - used page and internal links
button - useful for toggling JS calls and other on click/tap events

fields.label: Button Label
fields.name: button_label
fields.instructions: Text to display in button

fields.label: Outline
fields.name: outline
fields.instructions: Enable outline button style. See BS Docs for more info

fields.label: Size
fields.name: size
fields.instructions: Set button size style. See BS Docs for more info

fields.label: ID
fields.name: id
fields.instructions: Set #ID for button. Useful for targeting element for JS events

fields.label: FA Icon
fields.name: fa_icon
fields.instructions: Select a Font Aweosme Icon.

fields.label: Logo Grid
fields.name: logo_grid
fields.instructions: Add multiple sponsor logos.

fields.label: Internal Links Position
fields.name: internal_links_position
fields.instructions: Select where you want page links to render within the page.

fields.label: Header Custom Markup
fields.name: header_custom_markup
fields.instructions:
Add any custom markup need on individual pages here.
Useful for overlay CTA's, isotope filters for page content and internal links

fields.label: Background Type
fields.name: background_type
fields.instructions:
Select desire page header background type
Color = Solid color
Gradient = CSS gradient background properties
Image = Cover style image background

fields.label: Background Gradient
fields.name: background_gradient
fields.instructions: Add CSS gradient properties here. Ensure you include browser prefix properties for compatibility. DO NOT include a selector. For simplicity use the Colorzilla Gradient Generator and simply copy the provided properties here.

fields.label: Background Image Source
fields.name: featured_header_image
fields.instructions: Enable this this is you want to use the current set Featured Image. Generally you will want to use a unique header image however this is useful when the featured image is appropriate to use as a page thumbnail and banner.

fields.label: Header Image Background Position
fields.name: header_image_bgposition
fields.instructions: Set the background position

fields.label: Header Image Background Size
fields.name: header_image_bgsize
fields.instructions: Set the background image size

fields.label: Header Image Background Repeat
fields.name: header_image_bgrepeat
fields.instructions: Set the background image repeat

fields.label: Image Color Overlay Transparency
fields.name: img_color_overlay_transparency
fields.instructions: Select the opacity of your color overlay

fields.label: Image Overlay Gradient
fields.name: img_overlay_gradient
fields.instructions: Add CSS gradient properties here. Ensure you include browser prefix properties for compatibility. DO NOT include a selector. For simplicity use the Colorzilla Gradient Generator and simply copy the provided properties here.

fields.label: Page Header Width
fields.name: page_header_width
fields.instructions: Choose the page header styling. Wide - Extends the page header past the left and right boundaries of the site container by a fixed amount. (Default is 80px. To change this value add the $align_wide_width variable to the child themes _child_theme_variables.scss file and run gulp in the command line) Fullwidth - Forces the page header to fill the full width of the site

fields.label: Page Header Height
fields.name: page_header_height
fields.instructions:
Choose the height of the page header.
  Default - Standard height. Height of header content with padding
  Tall - Fixed header height. 550px

fields.label: Enable Advanced Header Alignment
fields.name: enable_advanced_header_alignment
fields.instructions:
Enables advanced header alignment options.
Will disable Title Alignment option

fields.label: Header Content Align
fields.name: header_content_align
fields.instructions: Set how header content aligns and spaces itself vertically
